https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-03-09/alphabet-s-waymo-takes-on-freight-in-atlanta-driverless-semis

links.title: Alphabet's Waymo Takes on Freight in Atlanta Driverless Semis
links.description: Look out, truckers. Waymo, the self-driving vehicle unit of Alphabet Inc., is taking its driverless truck tests to Atlanta, and this time they'll be carrying cargo. Waymo will start testing a fleet of autonomous freight trucks in Georgia's capital next week that will take deliveries to Google's data centers.

links.description: Highlights Next Trading Day: 79% Bearish Overview Moving lower for the 2nd day in a row, TSLA ended the week -2.37% lower at 327.17 after losing $1.93 (-0.59%) today following today's NFP report. Today's closing price of 327.17 marks the lowest close since February 14th.
